entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 10:11 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: 2.9°C
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening then to flurries overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
